<div align="center"><h1> Danbooru Tags Exporter</h1></div>

<div align="center">
<a href="https://github.com/FSpark/Danbooru-Tags-Exporter">
<img  alt="GitHub license" src="https://img.shields.io/github/license/FSpark/Danbooru-Tags-Exporter.svg?style=flat-square&color=4285dd&logo=github"></a>
<a href="https://sleazyfork.org/en/scripts/452976-danbooru-tags-select-to-export">
<img  src="https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=%20&message=GreasyFork&style=flat-square&labelColor=7B0000&color=960000&logo=data:image/png;base64,"></a>

<p>Select specified tags and copy to clipboard, for Stable Diffusion WebUI or NovelAI to use.</p>

</div>

## Screenshoot

![UI](./imgs/UI.png)

Will be exported as `tian \(my dear\), touhou, (((kirisame marisa))), 1girl, basket, (((blonde hair))), (curly hair), eyebrows hidden by hair, floating hair, [forest], [grass], hair between eyes, hat, holding, holding basket, long hair, looking at viewer, looking back, nature, solo, squatting, tree, witch, witch hat, yellow eyes`

> For display function only, the source of the picture is https://pixiv.net/artworks/102093005, thanks.
